selected_quotes: People can, at least to some degree, size up other people's intelligence from their facial features.
A new #AI worry? Someone (maybe in China) is going to develop a machine learning algorithm for this.
Our latest paper investigating accuracy of intelligence perceptions based on heritable facial features.
Blimey, an AI to judge your IQ (with reasonable accuracy) by your facial features?
Ant Lee is on Twitter now, follow him for good work on mate prefs, perceptions attractiveness and now IQ.
